name: Zombikini PinballZ
description:
It might be the zombipocalypse but at least the pinball machines still function.

It is pinball. You hit a little ball with paddles and keep it from dropping below the lowest paddles. Hit the signs of apocalypse with the ball to score points. Hit the girl in just the right spots to increase her arousal and gain multipliers to your final score.

Tear off all her clothes and reach maximum arousal to enter a mode where you get to play with her.

Unlock toys



Customisation and attachments



Features

  • Customisation and attachments
  • Play with one hand
  • Destroy clothing
  • Unlock toys
  • Play with the girl
